statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT location, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Headquarters%';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Cyber%' ORDER BY incident_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND location = 'Office Building';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type IN ('Virus Attack', 'Unauthorized Access') ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS incident_count FROM security_incidents GROUP BY incident_type HAVING incident_count > 1 ORDER BY incident_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, location FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM safety_measures WHERE measure_name = 'Fire Safety';
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM safety_measures;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 3 AND location = 'Office Building' ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT incident_date, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Store%'
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, location FROM security_incidents WHERE severity <= 2 ORDER BY incident_id
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' LIMIT 10
SELECT incident_id, location, severity FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%vandalism%'
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_location FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_severity = 1;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_severity > 2;
SELECT * FROM incident_types ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM incident_reports WHERE reporter_name LIKE '%John%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_severity > 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports JOIN security_incidents ON incident_reports.incident_id = security_incidents.incident_id;
SELECT incident_reports.report_description, security_incidents.incident_location FROM incident_reports JOIN security_incidents ON incident_reports.incident_id = security_incidents.incident_id;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_severity FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_severity ASC, incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM incident_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT incident_id, analyst_name, analysis_date FROM incident_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type='Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, location_name, city, country FROM security_incidents INNER JOIN incident_locations ON security_incidents.location_id = incident_locations.location_id;
SELECT incident_id, threat_level, findings FROM security_incidents LEFT JOIN incident_types ON security_incidents.incident_type = incident_types.incident_type;
SELECT MAX(analysis_date) AS latest_analysis_date, analyst_name FROM incident_analysis GROUP BY analyst_name ORDER BY latest_analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, location, description FROM incidents WHERE location = 'Office';
SELECT category, COUNT(incident_id) AS total_incidents FROM incidents_categories GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE reporter = 'John Doe' ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT analyst, analysis_date, findings FROM incident_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents
SELECT id, location FROM incidents ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM incidents JOIN incidents_categories ON incidents.id = incidents_categories.incident_id WHERE category = 'fire'
SELECT description FROM incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM incidents
